entry.title: Archive Post 17: Ads
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

This post will share ads received or scanned by the team.

Please enjoy and kindly share with all our brothers and sisters. If files are downloaded using the download buttons/arrows, please kindly do not change the names of the files (modulo replacements of underscores by spaces).

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Archives Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

Ad1.

1988-0408 Ad ‘Felicitations to Her Holiness Shri Mataji Nirmaladeviji’ published in ‘The Times of India Bombay’, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India, Page 4 (Anna Mancini Collection) (1 page, scanned by CCT and uploaded on 2024-0121)
entry.summary: Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs, This post will share ads received or scanned by the team. Please enjoy and kindly share with all our brothers and sisters. If files are downloaded using the download buttons/arrows, please kindly do not change the names of the files (modulo replacements of underscores by spaces). Jay Śhrī Mātājī! The Archives Subteam sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Archive Post 16: Australian Sahaja Newsletter, Part 4 (2000)

link.title: Archive Post 16: Australian Sahaja Newsletter, Part 4 (2000)

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

This post will share issues of Australian Sahaja Newsletter published in the 4th year (2000) and received or scanned by the team. This publication was a natural continuation of the The Australian Sahaja Newsletter.

Please enjoy and kindly share with all our brothers and sisters. If files are downloaded using the download buttons/arrows, please kindly do not change the names of the files (modulo replacements of underscores by spaces).

This is a joint project with Kannan Subrahmanyan from Australia.
For Part 1, please see Part 1.
For Part 2, please see Part 2.
For Part 3, please see Part 3.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Archives Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

2000THEAUSSAHNEW1.

2000-0107 Australian Sahaja Newsletter (Sue Raggatt Collection) (4 pages, scanned file, uploaded on 2023-1217 as 2 and 3 pages)
entry.summary: Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs, This post will share issues of Australian Sahaja Newsletter published in the 4th year (2000) and received or scanned by the team. This publication was a natural continuation of the The Australian Sahaja Newsletter. Please enjoy and kindly share with all our brothers and sisters. If files are downloaded using the download buttons/arrows, please kindly do not change the names of the files (modulo replacements of underscores by spaces). This is a joint project with Kannan Subrahmanyan from Australia. For Part 1, please see Part 1. For Part 2, please see Part 2. For Part 3, please see Part 3. Jay Śhrī Mātājī! The Archives Subteam sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
